written_expression.questionText: The d̲e̲c̲i̲s̲i̲o̲n̲s̲ made by the committee w̲a̲s̲ based on i̲n̲a̲c̲c̲u̲r̲a̲t̲e̲ data and b̲i̲a̲s̲e̲d̲ opinions.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'decisions' jamak, jadi to be harus 'were', bukan 'was'.

written_expression.questionText: D̲e̲s̲p̲i̲t̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ the rain, the o̲u̲t̲d̲o̲o̲r̲ concert continued a̲s̲ ̲p̲l̲a̲n̲n̲e̲d̲, much to the d̲e̲l̲i̲g̲h̲t̲ of the fans.
written_expression.explanation: Preposisi salah. 'Despite' tidak diikuti 'of'. Gunakan 'Despite the rain' atau 'In spite of the rain'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲o̲r̲e̲ ̲h̲a̲r̲d̲e̲r̲ you study for the e̲x̲a̲m̲, the b̲e̲t̲t̲e̲r̲ your results w̲i̲l̲l̲ ̲b̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Double Comparative. 'Harder' sudah komparatif, tidak perlu 'more'. Cukup 'The harder'.

written_expression.questionText: Elephants are c̲a̲p̲a̲b̲l̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ l̲i̲f̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ heavy objects w̲i̲t̲h̲ their trunks, which are e̲x̲t̲r̲e̲m̲e̲ strong.
written_expression.explanation: Adjective vs Adverb. 'Strong' adalah adjective, jadi harus dijelaskan oleh adverb 'extremely', bukan 'extreme'.

written_expression.questionText: Each of the s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲ a̲r̲e̲ ̲r̲e̲q̲u̲i̲r̲e̲d̲ ̲t̲o̲ s̲u̲b̲m̲i̲t̲ their term paper o̲n̲ ̲t̲i̲m̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Each' adalah subjek tunggal, jadi verb harus tunggal 'is required'.

written_expression.questionText: Usually the c̲l̲i̲m̲a̲t̲e̲ in m̲o̲u̲n̲t̲a̲i̲n̲o̲u̲s̲ areas is m̲u̲c̲h̲ ̲w̲i̲n̲d̲y̲ than i̲n̲ ̲t̲h̲e̲ plains.
written_expression.explanation: Comparative. Untuk membandingkan ('than'), gunakan 'windier' atau 'much windier', bukan 'much windy'.

written_expression.questionText: The director a̲s̲ ̲w̲e̲l̲l̲ ̲a̲s̲ his s̲e̲c̲r̲e̲t̲a̲r̲i̲e̲s̲ w̲e̲r̲e̲ invited to the a̲n̲n̲u̲a̲l̲ convention.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Jika subjek dipisah 'as well as', verb mengikuti subjek pertama ('The director' = tunggal), jadi harusnya 'was invited'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ the light, the city looks d̲i̲f̲f̲e̲r̲e̲n̲t̲l̲y̲ f̲r̲o̲m̲ the way I̲ ̲r̲e̲m̲e̲m̲b̲e̲r̲ it.
written_expression.explanation: Linking Verb. 'Looks' adalah linking verb yang harus diikuti adjective, bukan adverb. Harusnya 'looks different'.

written_expression.questionText: Before t̲o̲ ̲g̲o̲ out, remember t̲o̲ ̲t̲u̲r̲n̲ ̲o̲f̲f̲ the l̲i̲g̲h̲t̲s̲ and l̲o̲c̲k̲ the door.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition + Gerund. Setelah preposisi 'Before', gunakan gerund 'going', bukan infinitive 'to go'.

written_expression.questionText: Mathematics a̲r̲e̲ one of the m̲o̲s̲t̲ ̲d̲i̲f̲f̲i̲c̲u̲l̲t̲ subjects f̲o̲r̲ many s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Noun. 'Mathematics' meskipun berakhiran 's' adalah kata benda tunggal (nama ilmu), jadi harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: She w̲i̲s̲h̲e̲s̲ that she w̲a̲s̲ y̲o̲u̲n̲g̲e̲r̲ and m̲o̲r̲e̲ ̲e̲n̲e̲r̲g̲e̲t̲i̲c̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive. Dalam kalimat pengandaian (wish), to be untuk semua subjek adalah 'were'. Harusnya 'she were'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲l̲m̲o̲s̲t̲ ̲a̲l̲l̲ of the information i̲n̲ ̲t̲h̲e̲ report a̲p̲p̲e̲a̲r̲ to be o̲u̲t̲d̲a̲t̲e̲d̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Information' adalah uncountable (tunggal), jadi verb harus 'appears'.

written_expression.questionText: The loud noise f̲r̲o̲m̲ the construction site p̲r̲e̲v̲e̲n̲t̲e̲d̲ me t̲o̲ ̲s̲l̲e̲e̲p̲ l̲a̲s̲t̲ ̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Wrong Preposition. Pasangan kata 'prevent' adalah 'from + verb-ing'. Harusnya 'prevented me from sleeping'.

written_expression.questionText: There i̲s̲ m̲a̲n̲y̲ reasons why p̲e̲o̲p̲l̲e̲ choose to live i̲n̲ big cities.
written_expression.explanation: Inverted Subject. Subjeknya adalah 'many reasons' (jamak), jadi harusnya 'There are'.

written_expression.questionText: My brother e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲s̲ t̲o̲ ̲s̲w̲i̲m̲ in the ocean, b̲u̲t̲ I prefer t̲h̲e̲ ̲p̲o̲o̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund. Kata kerja 'enjoy' selalu diikuti gerund (V-ing), bukan infinitive. Harusnya 'enjoys swimming'.

written_expression.questionText: N̲e̲i̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ the teacher n̲o̲r̲ the students i̲s̲ ready for the u̲p̲c̲o̲m̲i̲n̲g̲ exam.
written_expression.explanation: Paired Conjunction. Dalam 'Neither...nor...', verb mengikuti subjek terdekat ('students' = jamak). Harusnya 'are ready'.

written_expression.questionText: Usually, the p̲o̲p̲u̲l̲a̲t̲i̲o̲n̲ in r̲u̲r̲a̲l̲ areas is m̲u̲c̲h̲ ̲l̲o̲w̲e̲r̲ than u̲r̲b̲a̲n̲ ̲a̲r̲e̲a̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Illogical Comparison. Kita membandingkan 'population' dengan 'population', bukan 'population' dengan 'area'. Harusnya 'than that of urban areas'.

written_expression.questionText: The book w̲a̲s̲ ̲w̲r̲i̲t̲t̲e̲n̲ b̲y̲ a famous author, w̲h̲o̲m̲ is known for h̲i̲s̲ mystery novels.
written_expression.explanation: Relative Pronoun. Pronoun berfungsi sebagai subjek dari klausa 'is known', jadi gunakan 'who', bukan 'whom'.

written_expression.questionText: Please g̲i̲v̲e̲ the message to w̲h̲o̲m̲e̲v̲e̲r̲ is s̲i̲t̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ at the f̲r̲o̲n̲t̲ desk.
written_expression.explanation: Relative Pronoun. Meskipun setelah preposisi, klausa noun-nya membutuhkan subjek untuk 'is sitting'. Gunakan 'whoever'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲o̲r̲e̲ ̲c̲a̲r̲e̲f̲u̲l̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲w̲o̲r̲k̲e̲r̲s̲ are, t̲h̲e̲ ̲l̲e̲s̲s̲ m̲i̲s̲t̲a̲k̲e̲s̲ ̲t̲h̲e̲y̲ make.
written_expression.explanation: Countable Noun. 'Mistakes' adalah countable, jadi harus 'the fewer mistakes'. 'Less' digunakan untuk uncountable nouns.

written_expression.questionText: We looked f̲o̲r̲w̲a̲r̲d̲ to m̲e̲e̲t̲ you a̲t̲ ̲t̲h̲e̲ conference n̲e̲x̲t̲ ̲w̲e̲e̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Idiomatic Expression. 'Look forward to' diikuti oleh Gerund (V-ing) atau Noun. Harusnya 'meeting'.

written_expression.questionText: It is e̲s̲s̲e̲n̲t̲i̲a̲l̲ that every student w̲e̲a̲r̲s̲ a uniform d̲u̲r̲i̲n̲g̲ the c̲e̲r̲e̲m̲o̲n̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'essential that', verb harus dalam bentuk dasar (bare infinitive). Harusnya 'wear'.

written_expression.questionText: Some people e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲ watching movies, w̲h̲i̲l̲e̲ others prefer t̲o̲ ̲r̲e̲a̲d̲ b̲o̲o̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Singular Countable Noun. 'Book' tidak bisa berdiri sendiri tanpa determiner. Harusnya 'books' (jamak umum) atau 'a book'.

written_expression.questionText: N̲e̲v̲e̲r̲ ̲b̲e̲f̲o̲r̲e̲ I̲ ̲h̲a̲v̲e̲ seen s̲u̲c̲h̲ ̲a̲ b̲e̲a̲u̲t̲i̲f̲u̲l̲ sunset.
written_expression.explanation: Inversion. Jika kalimat dimulai dengan negatif ('Never before'), susunan subjek-verb dibalik. Harusnya 'have I seen'.

written_expression.questionText: The effects of c̲i̲g̲a̲r̲e̲t̲t̲e̲ smoking h̲a̲v̲e̲ ̲b̲e̲e̲n̲ p̲r̲o̲v̲e̲n̲ to be e̲x̲t̲r̲e̲m̲e̲ harmful.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb usage. 'Harmful' adalah adjective, jadi harus dijelaskan oleh adverb 'extremely'.

written_expression.questionText: O̲n̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ the m̲o̲s̲t̲ ̲f̲a̲m̲o̲u̲s̲ s̲c̲i̲e̲n̲t̲i̲s̲t̲ in the world i̲s̲ Albert Einstein.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. Pola 'One of the...' harus diikuti kata benda jamak. Harusnya 'scientists'.

written_expression.questionText: U̲n̲l̲i̲k̲e̲ most birds, p̲e̲n̲g̲u̲i̲n̲s̲ are flightless a̲n̲d̲ excellent s̲w̲i̲m̲m̲e̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Parallelism/Number. Subjek 'penguins' jamak, jadi komplemennya juga harus jamak. Harusnya 'swimmers'.

written_expression.questionText: The a̲m̲o̲u̲n̲t̲ of people w̲a̲i̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ for the concert tickets w̲a̲s̲ s̲u̲r̲p̲r̲i̲s̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: Countable Noun. 'People' adalah countable, jadi gunakan 'number', bukan 'amount'. 'The number of people'.

written_expression.questionText: We had b̲e̲t̲t̲e̲r̲ ̲t̲o̲ l̲e̲a̲v̲e̲ early if w̲e̲ want to avoid t̲h̲e̲ ̲t̲r̲a̲f̲f̲i̲c̲.
written_expression.explanation: Modal Usage. 'Had better' diikuti bare infinitive (verb 1 tanpa 'to'). Harusnya 'We had better leave'.

written_expression.questionText: Not only d̲i̲d̲ ̲h̲e̲ f̲o̲r̲g̲o̲t̲ his wallet, b̲u̲t̲ he also lost h̲i̲s̲ ̲k̲e̲y̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Auxiliary Verb. Setelah 'did', kata kerja harus kembali ke bentuk dasar. Harusnya 'forget'.

written_expression.questionText: T̲h̲e̲ new computer system is f̲a̲r̲ ̲m̲o̲r̲e̲ efficient a̲s̲ the o̲l̲d̲ ̲o̲n̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Comparative. Pasangan dari 'more efficient' adalah 'than', bukan 'as'.

written_expression.questionText: Sarah h̲a̲s̲ ̲b̲e̲e̲n̲ working a̲s̲ a nurse s̲i̲n̲c̲e̲ t̲e̲n̲ ̲y̲e̲a̲r̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition of Time. Untuk durasi waktu (ten years), gunakan 'for'. Gunakan 'since' untuk titik waktu tertentu.

written_expression.questionText: The biology students a̲r̲e̲ ̲r̲e̲q̲u̲i̲r̲e̲d̲ t̲o̲ ̲d̲i̲s̲s̲e̲c̲t̲ a frog, w̲h̲i̲c̲h̲ ̲i̲t̲ ̲i̲s̲ a̲n̲ unpleasa̲n̲t task.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. Relative pronoun 'which' sudah berfungsi sebagai subjek. Menambahkan 'it' membuatnya mubazir. Harusnya 'which is'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ his sickness, h̲e̲ could not a̲t̲t̲e̲n̲d̲ th̲e̲ meeting h̲e̲l̲d̲ yesterday.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition. 'Because' adalah conjunction (diikuti kalimat). Karena 'his sickness' adalah noun phrase, gunakan 'Because of'.

written_expression.questionText: The professor asked the students n̲o̲t̲ ̲t̲o̲ ̲t̲a̲l̲k̲ d̲u̲r̲i̲n̲g̲ the exam, b̲u̲t̲ they kept t̲o̲ ̲w̲h̲i̲s̲p̲e̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund. Kata kerja 'keep' diikuti gerund (V-ing). Harusnya 'kept whispering'.

written_expression.questionText: It was s̲u̲c̲h̲ a cold day t̲h̲a̲t̲ the water in the lake f̲r̲e̲e̲z̲e̲ s̲o̲l̲i̲d̲.
written_expression.explanation: Tense Consistency. Kalimat awal 'It was' (Past Tense), maka kata kerja selanjutnya harus Past Tense. Harusnya 'froze'.

written_expression.questionText: Neither the driver o̲r̲ the passengers w̲e̲r̲e̲ i̲n̲jured i̲n̲ the accident l̲a̲s̲t̲ ̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Paired Conjunction. Pasangan 'Neither' adalah 'nor', bukan 'or'.

written_expression.questionText: The team members d̲i̲s̲c̲u̲s̲s̲e̲d̲ ̲a̲b̲o̲u̲t̲ t̲h̲e̲ problem f̲o̲r̲ hours w̲i̲t̲h̲o̲u̲t̲ finding a solution.
written_expression.explanation: Transitive Verb. 'Discuss' langsung diikuti objek tanpa preposisi. Hapus 'about'. Harusnya 'discussed the problem'.

written_expression.questionText: D̲e̲s̲p̲i̲t̲e̲ he is rich, he l̲i̲v̲e̲s̲ in a s̲m̲a̲l̲l̲ house and d̲r̲i̲v̲e̲s̲ an old car.
written_expression.explanation: Conjunction vs Preposition. 'Despite' diikuti noun phrase. Karena diikuti klausa 'he is rich', gunakan conjunction 'Although'.

written_expression.questionText: The f̲i̲v̲e̲-̲d̲o̲l̲l̲a̲r̲s̲ bill w̲a̲s̲ found o̲n̲ the floor n̲e̲a̲r̲ the entrance.
written_expression.explanation: Compound Adjective. Ketika angka dan noun digabung menjadi adjective (sebelum noun lain 'bill'), noun tersebut tidak boleh jamak. Harusnya 'five-dollar'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲m̲o̲n̲g̲ the three candidates, John is t̲h̲e̲ ̲m̲o̲r̲e̲ qualified f̲o̲r̲ the p̲o̲s̲i̲t̲i̲o̲n̲.
written_expression.explanation: Superlative. Karena ada 3 kandidat ('Among the three'), gunakan superlative 'the most qualified', bukan comparative.

written_expression.questionText: The machinery u̲s̲e̲d̲ in t̲h̲i̲s̲ factory n̲e̲e̲d̲s̲ to be r̲e̲p̲a̲i̲r̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: Passive Meaning. 'Needs' bisa diikuti V-ing (repairing) ATAU passive infinitive (to be repaired). Tapi pola 'needs to be repairing' salah. Harusnya 'needs repairing' atau 'needs to be repaired'. Karena ada 'to be', pilihannya 'repaired'.

written_expression.questionText: This tea is t̲o̲o̲ hot t̲h̲a̲t̲ I c̲a̲n̲n̲o̲t̲ drink i̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Correlative Conjunction. Pasangan 'that' (result) adalah 'so', bukan 'too'. Harusnya 'So hot that...'.

written_expression.questionText: My sister, a̲c̲c̲o̲m̲p̲a̲n̲i̲e̲d̲ by her friends, a̲r̲e̲ going t̲o̲ the cinema t̲o̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Frasa 'accompanied by' tidak mengubah subjek. Subjek tetap 'My sister' (tunggal). Harusnya 'is going'.

written_expression.questionText: The manager s̲u̲g̲g̲e̲s̲t̲e̲d̲ that w̲e̲ arrive l̲a̲t̲e̲l̲y̲ for the m̲e̲e̲t̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: Word Usage. 'Lately' artinya 'akhir-akhir ini'. Untuk 'terlambat', gunakan 'late'.

written_expression.questionText: M̲a̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ a detailed schedule i̲s̲ the best way t̲o̲ ̲e̲n̲s̲u̲r̲e̲ that you f̲i̲n̲i̲s̲h̲i̲n̲g̲ the project.
written_expression.explanation: Parallelism / verb form. Setelah subjek 'you', butuh finite verb, bukan participle. Harusnya 'finish'.

written_expression.questionText: The invention o̲f̲ the telephone b̲y̲ Alexander Graham Bell a̲l̲l̲o̲w̲e̲d̲ people c̲o̲m̲m̲u̲n̲i̲c̲a̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ instantly.
written_expression.explanation: Infinitive. Kata 'allow' diikuti object + to infinitive. Harusnya 'allowed people to communicate'.

written_expression.questionText: If I h̲a̲v̲e̲ ̲k̲n̲o̲w̲n̲ a̲b̲o̲u̲t̲ the traffic, I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ ̲h̲a̲v̲e̲ l̲e̲f̲t̲ earlier.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Type 3. Struktur 'if' past perfect: 'If I had known', bukan 'have known'.

written_expression.questionText: Each c̲o̲u̲n̲t̲r̲y̲ has t̲h̲e̲i̲r̲ own t̲r̲a̲d̲i̲t̲i̲o̲n̲s̲ and c̲u̲s̲t̲o̲m̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Pronoun Agreement. 'Each country' adalah tunggal, jadi possessive pronoun-nya harus tunggal ('its'), bukan 'their'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲a̲p̲i̲d̲ growth of the city h̲a̲v̲e̲ ̲l̲e̲d̲ to a̲n̲ ̲i̲n̲c̲r̲e̲a̲s̲e̲ in t̲r̲a̲f̲f̲i̲c̲ congestion.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek intinya adalah 'growth' (tunggal), bukan 'city'. Harusnya 'has led'.

written_expression.questionText: The h̲a̲r̲d̲e̲r̲ he t̲r̲i̲e̲d̲ to solve t̲h̲e̲ problem, t̲h̲e̲ m̲o̲s̲t̲ confused he became.
written_expression.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The more..., the more...'. Pasangan 'the harder' harusnya diikuti bentuk komparatif 'the more confused', bukan superlatif 'most'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ the approaching storm, the r̲e̲s̲i̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲ were advised t̲o̲ ̲n̲o̲t̲ l̲e̲a̲v̲e̲ their homes.
written_expression.explanation: Split Infinitive/Negative Infinitive. Urutan yang lebih baku dan tepat secara gramatikal adalah 'not to leave', bukan 'to not leave'.

written_expression.questionText: The curriculum i̲n̲ thi̲s̲ school i̲s̲ quite different f̲r̲o̲m̲ t̲h̲a̲t̲ ̲o̲f̲ other school.
written_expression.explanation: Logical Comparison/Noun Number. Kita membandingkan kurikulum sekolah ini dengan sekolah-sekolah lain (jamak umum). Harusnya 'other schools' atau 'another school'.

written_expression.questionText: He i̲s̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲o̲n̲l̲y̲ one of the b̲o̲y̲s̲ who p̲l̲a̲y̲ the guitar.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Klausa 'who...' merujuk pada 'the only one' (tunggal), bukan 'boys'. Harusnya 'plays'.

written_expression.questionText: M̲u̲m̲p̲s̲ a̲r̲e̲ a very c̲o̲m̲m̲o̲n̲ disease a̲m̲o̲n̲g̲ children.
written_expression.explanation: Singular Noun ending in -s. 'Mumps' (gondongan) adalah nama penyakit (tunggal). Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ ̲r̲a̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ t̲h̲a̲t̲ you d̲o̲ ̲n̲o̲t̲ call me a̲t̲ ̲w̲o̲r̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive after 'Would Rather'. Jika 'would rather' diikuti subjek baru (that you...), verb harus dalam bentuk Past Tense. Harusnya 'did not call'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲e̲s̲u̲l̲t̲ of the s̲t̲u̲d̲i̲e̲s̲ h̲a̲v̲e̲ ̲b̲e̲e̲n̲ p̲u̲b̲l̲i̲s̲h̲e̲d̲ recently.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek intinya adalah 'result' (tunggal), bukan 'studies'. Harusnya 'has been'.

written_expression.questionText: N̲o̲t̲ ̲u̲n̲t̲i̲l̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲w̲a̲r̲ ended t̲h̲e̲ ̲s̲o̲l̲d̲i̲e̲r̲s̲ w̲e̲r̲e̲ able to return home.
written_expression.explanation: Inversion. Frasa negatif 'Not until' di awal kalimat mengharuskan inversi pada klausa utama. Harusnya 'were the soldiers able'.

written_expression.questionText: The e̲q̲u̲i̲p̲m̲e̲n̲t̲ in the laboratory n̲e̲e̲d̲ to be r̲e̲p̲l̲a̲c̲e̲d̲ i̲m̲m̲e̲d̲i̲a̲t̲e̲l̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Equipment' tidak bisa dihitung (selalu tunggal). Harusnya 'needs'.

written_expression.questionText: D̲e̲s̲p̲i̲t̲e̲ his b̲u̲s̲y̲ schedule, he m̲a̲n̲a̲g̲e̲d̲ ̲f̲i̲n̲i̲s̲h̲i̲n̲g̲ the project o̲n̲ ̲t̲i̲m̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Infinitive Usage. Kata kerja 'manage' diikuti to-infinitive. Harusnya 'managed to finish'.

written_expression.questionText: The v̲i̲e̲w̲ from the top of the mountain was b̲e̲a̲u̲t̲i̲f̲u̲l̲ than I̲ h̲a̲d̲ ̲e̲x̲p̲e̲c̲t̲e̲d̲.
written_expression.explanation: Comparative. Karena ada kata 'than', adjective harus dalam bentuk komparatif. Harusnya 'more beautiful'.

written_expression.questionText: Every m̲a̲n̲, woman, and child i̲n̲ this town a̲r̲e̲ expected to attend t̲h̲e̲ festival.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek yang diawali 'Every' selalu dianggap tunggal. Harusnya 'is expected'.

written_expression.questionText: It was h̲i̲m̲ who b̲r̲o̲k̲e̲ the vase a̲c̲c̲i̲d̲e̲n̲t̲a̲l̲l̲y̲ y̲e̲s̲t̲e̲r̲d̲a̲y̲ morning.
written_expression.explanation: Pronoun Case. Setelah to be 'was', gunakan subject pronoun 'he', bukan object pronoun 'him'. Harusnya 'It was he who...'.

written_expression.questionText: The antique table, w̲h̲i̲c̲h̲ was s̲o̲l̲d̲ at the auction, i̲t̲ ̲w̲a̲s̲ worth a f̲o̲r̲t̲u̲n̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Double Subject. 'The antique table' adalah subjek dari 'was worth'. Kata 'it' berlebihan (redundant). Hapus 'it'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲u̲y̲i̲n̲g̲ clothes a̲r̲e̲ often a very t̲i̲m̲e̲-̲c̲o̲n̲s̲u̲m̲i̲n̲g̲ practice b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ those clothes that a person likes a̲r̲e̲ ra̲r̲e̲ly the ones that fit him or her.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund as Subject. 'Buying clothes' adalah frase gerund (tunggal). Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: Neither the p̲r̲o̲f̲e̲s̲s̲o̲r̲ nor his assistants w̲a̲s̲ able to s̲o̲l̲v̲e̲ the m̲y̲s̲t̲e̲r̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Paired Conjunction Agreement. Pada 'Neither...nor', verb mengikuti subjek terdekat ('assistants' = jamak). Harusnya 'were able'.

written_expression.questionText: The n̲u̲m̲b̲e̲r̲ of students a̲t̲t̲e̲n̲d̲i̲n̲g̲ the lecture a̲r̲e̲ i̲n̲c̲r̲e̲a̲s̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: The number vs A number. 'The number' (jumlah spesifik) selalu tunggal. Harusnya 'is increasing'.

written_expression.questionText: If it w̲i̲l̲l̲ ̲r̲a̲i̲n̲ tomorrow, we w̲i̲l̲l̲ ̲h̲a̲v̲e̲ t̲o̲ ̲c̲a̲n̲c̲e̲l̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲p̲i̲c̲n̲i̲c̲.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Type 1. Klausa 'If' menggunakan Simple Present, bukan Future. Harusnya 'If it rains'.

written_expression.questionText: Th̲e̲ doctor suggested that h̲e̲ s̲t̲o̲p̲s̲ smoking i̲m̲m̲e̲d̲i̲a̲t̲e̲l̲y̲ f̲o̲r̲ his h̲e̲alth.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'suggested that', verb harus bare infinitive (bentuk dasar). Harusnya 'he stop'.

written_expression.questionText: There is t̲o̲o̲ ̲m̲a̲n̲y̲ p̲o̲l̲l̲u̲t̲i̲o̲n̲ in the a̲i̲r̲ t̲o̲d̲a̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Quantifier. 'Pollution' adalah uncountable noun. Gunakan 'too much', bukan 'too many'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲l̲i̲k̲e̲ my friends, I e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲ p̲l̲a̲y̲i̲n̲g̲ video games o̲n̲ weekends.
written_expression.explanation: Word Usage. 'Alike' adalah adjective/adverb (biasanya di akhir). Untuk preposisi 'seperti', gunakan 'Like'.

written_expression.questionText: The manager, t̲o̲g̲e̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ ̲w̲i̲t̲h̲ h̲i̲s̲ employees, a̲r̲e̲ going to the c̲o̲n̲f̲e̲r̲e̲n̲c̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Intervening Phrase. Frasa 'together with' tidak mengubah jumlah subjek utama 'The manager' (tunggal). Harusnya 'is going'.

written_expression.questionText: By t̲h̲e̲ time h̲e̲ ̲a̲r̲r̲i̲v̲e̲s̲, we w̲i̲l̲l̲ ̲f̲i̲n̲i̲s̲h̲ t̲h̲e̲ w̲o̲r̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Future Perfect. Aksi akan 'sudah selesai' sebelum waktu tertentu di masa depan. Harusnya 'will have finished'.

written_expression.questionText: T̲h̲o̲s̲e̲ ̲k̲i̲n̲d̲ of movies a̲l̲w̲a̲y̲s̲ m̲a̲k̲e̲s̲ me c̲r̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Demonstrative Agreement. 'Kind' tunggal, jadi harusnya 'That kind' atau 'Those kinds'.

written_expression.questionText: We d̲i̲s̲c̲u̲s̲s̲e̲d̲ ̲a̲b̲o̲u̲t̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲p̲l̲a̲n̲s̲ for the u̲p̲c̲o̲m̲i̲n̲g̲ h̲o̲l̲i̲d̲a̲y̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Redundant Preposition. 'Discuss' adalah transitive verb, langsung objek. Hapus 'about'. Harusnya 'discussed the plans'.

written_expression.questionText: The e̲f̲f̲e̲c̲t̲s̲ of the earthquake w̲e̲r̲e̲ f̲e̲l̲t̲ w̲i̲d̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb vs Adjective. Untuk menjelaskan verb 'felt', butuh adverb. Harusnya 'widely'.

written_expression.questionText: I l̲o̲o̲k̲ ̲f̲o̲r̲w̲a̲r̲d̲ t̲o̲ ̲h̲e̲a̲r̲ from y̲o̲u̲ s̲o̲o̲n̲.
written_expression.explanation: Idiom. 'Look forward to' harus diikuti Gerund (V-ing). Harusnya 'to hearing'.

written_expression.questionText: M̲a̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ f̲r̲i̲e̲n̲d̲s̲ a̲r̲e̲ more difficult t̲h̲a̲n̲ I thought.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund Subject. Subjeknya adalah aktivitas 'Making' (tunggal), bukan 'friends'. Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: She is i̲n̲t̲e̲r̲e̲s̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ i̲n̲ learni̲n̲g h̲o̲w̲ to play t̲h̲e̲ piano.
written_expression.explanation: Participle Adjective. Dia 'tertarik' (perasaan yang diterima), bukan 'menarik'. Harusnya 'interested'.

written_expression.questionText: The f̲i̲v̲e̲-̲y̲e̲a̲r̲s̲-̲o̲l̲d̲ boy c̲a̲n̲ play c̲h̲e̲s̲s̲ v̲e̲r̲y̲ ̲w̲e̲l̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Compound Adjective. Saat angka menjadi adjektiva sebelum noun, jangan jamakkan. Harusnya 'five-year-old'.

written_expression.questionText: We a̲r̲r̲i̲v̲e̲d̲ a̲t̲ the airport l̲a̲t̲e̲l̲y̲ d̲u̲e̲ ̲t̲o̲ traffic.
written_expression.explanation: Word Meaning. 'Lately' = akhir-akhir ini. 'Late' = terlambat. Harusnya 'late'.

written_expression.questionText: The man w̲h̲o̲m̲ I̲ spoke to h̲i̲m̲ was v̲e̲r̲y̲ helpful.
written_expression.explanation: Redundant Pronoun. 'Whom' sudah menggantikan objek. 'Him' tidak diperlukan lagi. Hapus 'him'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲l̲m̲o̲s̲t̲ ̲a̲l̲l̲ of the w̲a̲t̲e̲r̲ h̲a̲v̲e̲ evaporated f̲r̲o̲m̲ the glass.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Water' adalah uncountable noun (tunggal). Harusnya 'has evaporated'.

written_expression.questionText: If I w̲a̲s̲ you, I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ study h̲a̲r̲d̲e̲r̲ for t̲h̲e̲ test.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Type 2. Untuk pengandaian, 'to be' selalu 'were' untuk semua subjek. Harusnya 'If I were you'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲i̲c̲h̲ h̲a̲s̲ a responsibility t̲o̲ ̲h̲e̲l̲p̲ the p̲o̲o̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: The + Adjective. 'The rich' merujuk pada 'orang-orang kaya' (jamak). Harusnya 'have'.

written_expression.questionText: She c̲a̲n̲n̲o̲t̲ h̲a̲r̲d̲l̲y̲ wait t̲o̲ ̲s̲e̲e̲ h̲e̲r̲ parents.
written_expression.explanation: Double Negative. 'Hardly' sudah bermakna negatif. Jangan gunakan 'cannot' dan 'hardly' bersamaan. Harusnya 'can hardly wait'.

written_expression.questionText: This is the h̲o̲u̲s̲e̲ w̲h̲e̲r̲e̲ I w̲a̲s̲ b̲o̲r̲n̲ ̲i̲n̲.
written_expression.explanation: Redundant Preposition. 'Where' sudah mencakup makna tempat ('in which'). Jangan gunakan 'in' lagi di akhir. Atau ganti 'where' dengan 'which'. Jika 'where' dipakai, hapus 'in'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲e̲a̲s̲o̲n̲ b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ he f̲a̲i̲l̲e̲d̲ was his l̲a̲c̲k̲ ̲o̲f̲ effort.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. 'The reason' pasangannya adalah 'that', bukan 'because'. Harusnya 'The reason that he failed...'.

written_expression.questionText: Of t̲h̲e̲ two s̲i̲s̲t̲e̲r̲s̲, Sarah is t̲h̲e̲ m̲o̲s̲t̲ b̲e̲a̲u̲t̲i̲f̲u̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Comparative vs Superlative. Jika hanya ada dua benda/orang, gunakan komparatif. Harusnya 'more'.

written_expression.questionText: I p̲r̲e̲f̲e̲r̲ coffee t̲h̲a̲n̲ t̲e̲a̲ in t̲h̲e̲ morning.
written_expression.explanation: Prefer usage. Pasangan 'prefer' adalah 'to', bukan 'than'. Harusnya 'prefer coffee to tea'.

written_expression.questionText: H̲a̲d̲ I k̲n̲o̲w̲n̲ the answer, I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ ̲t̲e̲l̲l̲ y̲o̲u̲.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Type 3 (Inverted). 'Had I known' (Past Perfect) harus diikuti 'would have told' (Perfect Conditional). Harusnya 'would have told'.

written_expression.questionText: We o̲b̲j̲e̲c̲t̲ ̲t̲o̲ l̲e̲a̲v̲e̲ the m̲e̲e̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ e̲a̲r̲l̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund after Preposition. 'Object to' adalah frasa preposisi, diikuti V-ing. Harusnya 'leaving'.

written_expression.questionText: The p̲o̲l̲i̲c̲e̲ i̲s̲ investigating t̲h̲e̲ c̲r̲i̲m̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Collective Noun. 'Police' selalu dianggap jamak. Harusnya 'are investigating'.

written_expression.questionText: It is i̲m̲p̲o̲r̲t̲a̲n̲t̲ that s̲h̲e̲ r̲e̲m̲e̲m̲b̲e̲r̲s̲ to l̲o̲c̲k̲ the door.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah adjective of importance (important that), verb harus bare infinitive. Harusnya 'remember'.

written_expression.questionText: The i̲n̲f̲o̲r̲m̲a̲t̲i̲o̲n̲s̲ g̲i̲v̲e̲n̲ b̲y̲ the teacher w̲e̲r̲e̲ incorrect.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Information' tidak bisa dijamakkan dengan 's'. Harusnya 'information'.

written_expression.questionText: He w̲o̲r̲k̲s̲ a̲s̲ a d̲e̲n̲t̲i̲s̲t̲ s̲i̲n̲c̲e̲ 2010.
written_expression.explanation: Tense. Karena ada penanda waktu 'since 2010', gunakan Present Perfect. Harusnya 'has worked'.

written_expression.questionText: She is u̲s̲e̲d̲ ̲t̲o̲ w̲a̲k̲e̲ ̲u̲p̲ e̲a̲r̲l̲y̲ i̲n̲ the morni̲n̲g.
written_expression.explanation: Be Used To + V-ing. 'Be used to' (terbiasa) diikuti gerund. Harusnya 'waking up'.

written_expression.questionText: O̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ people m̲i̲g̲h̲t̲ agree w̲i̲t̲h̲ you, but a̲n̲o̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ don't.
written_expression.explanation: Pronoun Usage. 'Another' biasanya tunggal. Untuk menggantikan 'other people' (jamak), gunakan 'others'.

written_expression.questionText: The s̲c̲i̲s̲s̲o̲r̲s̲ i̲s̲ o̲n̲ the t̲a̲b̲l̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. Benda berpasangan seperti 'scissors', 'pants', 'glasses' dianggap jamak. Harusnya 'are'.

written_expression.questionText: W̲h̲o̲m̲e̲v̲e̲r̲ w̲a̲n̲t̲s̲ t̲o̲ come t̲o̲ the party i̲s̲ welcome.
written_expression.explanation: Pronoun Case. Kata ganti ini berfungsi sebagai subjek dari 'wants'. Gunakan 'Whoever', bukan 'Whomever'.

written_expression.questionText: The d̲e̲v̲e̲l̲o̲p̲ of the n̲e̲w̲ policy t̲o̲o̲k̲ longer t̲h̲a̲n̲ expected.
written_expression.explanation: Word Form. Dibutuhkan kata benda (noun) sebagai subjek, bukan kata kerja. Harusnya 'development'.

written_expression.questionText: She h̲a̲r̲d̲l̲y̲ ̲n̲e̲v̲e̲r̲ g̲o̲e̲s̲ to t̲h̲e̲ cinema a̲l̲o̲n̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Double Negative. 'Hardly' dan 'never' keduanya bermakna negatif. Harusnya 'hardly ever'.

written_expression.questionText: Please w̲r̲i̲t̲e̲ me a̲s̲ ̲s̲o̲o̲n̲ ̲a̲s̲ y̲o̲u̲ w̲i̲l̲l̲ ̲a̲r̲r̲i̲v̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Time Clause. Dalam klausa waktu ('as soon as...'), gunakan Present Tense untuk masa depan, bukan Future Tense. Harusnya 'arrive'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲o̲s̲t̲ i̲m̲p̲o̲r̲t̲a̲n̲t̲e̲s̲t̲ thing i̲s̲ to r̲e̲m̲a̲i̲n̲ calm.
written_expression.explanation: Double Superlative. Adjective panjang 'important' menggunakan 'most', tidak perlu akhiran '-est'. Harusnya 'important'.

written_expression.questionText: Neit̲h̲e̲r of t̲h̲e̲ t̲w̲o̲ candidates a̲r̲e̲ s̲u̲i̲t̲a̲b̲l̲e̲ for t̲h̲e̲ job.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Neither of' (tanpa 'nor') dianggap tunggal. Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: I e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲e̲d̲ t̲o̲ ̲w̲a̲t̲c̲h̲ t̲h̲e̲ performance l̲a̲s̲t̲ ̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund. Kata kerja 'enjoy' selalu diikuti V-ing. Harusnya 'watching'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲ ̲n̲u̲m̲b̲e̲r̲ ̲o̲f̲ s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲ h̲a̲s̲ w̲i̲t̲h̲d̲r̲a̲w̲n̲ from the class.
written_expression.explanation: A Number vs The Number. 'A number of' bermakna 'beberapa' (jamak). Harusnya 'have'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲a̲n̲ w̲h̲i̲c̲h̲ lives n̲e̲x̲t̲ ̲d̲o̲o̲r̲ is a̲ ̲d̲e̲n̲t̲i̲s̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Relative Pronoun. Untuk orang ('man'), gunakan 'who', bukan 'which'.

written_expression.questionText: They a̲s̲k̲e̲d̲ u̲s̲ n̲o̲t̲ ̲m̲a̲k̲e̲ s̲o̲ ̲m̲u̲c̲h̲ noise.
written_expression.explanation: Negative Infinitive. Struktur 'ask + object + to infinitive'. Harusnya 'not to make'.

written_expression.questionText: It is n̲e̲c̲e̲s̲s̲a̲r̲y̲ that h̲e̲ s̲i̲g̲n̲s̲ th̲e̲ contract b̲e̲f̲o̲r̲e̲ noon.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'necessary that', verb harus bare infinitive. Harusnya 'sign'.

written_expression.questionText: The n̲e̲w̲s̲ w̲e̲r̲e̲ s̲h̲o̲c̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ to e̲v̲e̲r̲y̲o̲n̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'News' adalah kata benda tunggal. Harusnya 'was'.

written_expression.questionText: I w̲i̲s̲h̲ I h̲a̲v̲e̲ m̲o̲r̲e̲ time t̲o̲ ̲s̲t̲u̲d̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Wish Structure. Untuk harapan di masa sekarang (present wish), gunakan Past Tense. Harusnya 'had'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲s̲i̲d̲e̲ mathematics, s̲h̲e̲ e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲s̲ p̲h̲y̲s̲i̲c̲s̲ and chemistry.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition Meaning. 'Beside' = di samping. 'Besides' = selain/di samping itu. Konteks ini butuh 'Besides'.

written_expression.questionText: The h̲a̲r̲d̲e̲r̲ y̲o̲u̲ practice, the b̲e̲s̲t̲ y̲o̲u̲ ̲b̲e̲c̲o̲m̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The more..., the more...'. Pasangan 'harder' adalah komparatif 'better', bukan superlatif 'best'.

written_expression.questionText: Everyone a̲r̲e̲ e̲x̲p̲e̲c̲t̲e̲d̲ t̲o̲ ̲a̲r̲r̲i̲v̲e̲ b̲y̲ 9:00 AM.
written_expression.explanation: Indefinite Pronoun. 'Everyone' selalu dianggap tunggal. Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: We h̲a̲v̲e̲ ̲v̲i̲s̲i̲t̲e̲d̲ t̲h̲e̲ museum y̲e̲s̲t̲e̲r̲d̲a̲y̲ a̲f̲t̲e̲r̲n̲o̲o̲n̲.
written_expression.explanation: Tense. Ada penanda waktu lampau spesifik ('yesterday afternoon'), gunakan Simple Past, bukan Present Perfect. Harusnya 'visited'.

written_expression.questionText: The c̲h̲i̲l̲d̲r̲e̲n̲ w̲a̲s̲ playi̲n̲g i̲n̲ the p̲a̲r̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. 'Children' adalah jamak dari 'child'. Harusnya 'were'.

written_expression.questionText: I a̲m̲ ̲n̲o̲t̲ u̲s̲e̲d̲ ̲t̲o̲ d̲r̲i̲v̲e̲ o̲n̲ the left side of the road.
written_expression.explanation: Be Used To. Struktur 'be used to' (terbiasa) diikuti V-ing. Harusnya 'driving'.

written_expression.questionText: D̲e̲s̲p̲i̲t̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ his i̲l̲l̲n̲e̲s̲s̲, he w̲e̲n̲t̲ ̲t̲o̲ w̲o̲r̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition. 'Despite' tidak pakai 'of'. Gunakan 'Despite' saja atau 'In spite of'.

written_expression.questionText: The p̲o̲p̲u̲l̲a̲t̲i̲o̲n̲ of C̲h̲i̲n̲a̲ is l̲a̲r̲g̲e̲r̲ ̲t̲h̲a̲n̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲U̲n̲i̲t̲e̲d̲ ̲S̲t̲a̲t̲e̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Logical Comparison. Membandingkan populasi dengan populasi, bukan populasi dengan negara. Harusnya 'than that of the United States'.

written_expression.questionText: He w̲o̲r̲k̲s̲ h̲a̲r̲d̲l̲y̲ t̲o̲ ̲s̲u̲p̲p̲o̲r̲t̲ h̲i̲s̲ family.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb Meaning. 'Hardly' = hampir tidak. 'Hard' = keras/giat. Harusnya 'works hard'.

written_expression.questionText: E̲a̲c̲h̲ of the s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲ h̲a̲s̲ a b̲o̲o̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Each of + Plural Noun. Setelah 'each of the', kata bendanya harus jamak. Harusnya 'students'.

written_expression.questionText: The e̲f̲f̲e̲c̲t̲s̲ of p̲o̲l̲l̲u̲t̲i̲o̲n̲ i̲s̲ h̲a̲r̲m̲f̲u̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek utama 'effects' (jamak). Harusnya 'are'.

written_expression.questionText: I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ ̲r̲a̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ t̲o̲ ̲s̲t̲a̲y̲ h̲o̲m̲e̲ t̲o̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Would Rather. Diikuti bare infinitive (V1 tanpa to). Harusnya 'stay'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲o̲v̲i̲e̲ wa̲s̲ s̲o̲ boring a̲s̲ I f̲e̲l̲l̲ ̲a̲s̲l̲e̲e̲p̲.
written_expression.explanation: Correlative Conjunction. Pasangan 'so... that...', bukan 'so... as...'. Harusnya 'that'.

written_expression.questionText: She s̲p̲e̲a̲k̲s̲ E̲n̲g̲l̲i̲s̲h̲ g̲o̲o̲d̲e̲r̲ than I̲ ̲d̲o̲.
written_expression.explanation: Irregular Comparative. Komparatif dari 'well' (adverb) atau 'good' (adjective) adalah 'better', bukan 'gooder'.

written_expression.questionText: Only r̲a̲r̲e̲l̲y̲ I̲ ̲h̲a̲v̲e̲ s̲e̲e̲n̲ such b̲e̲a̲u̲t̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Inversion. Kalimat diawali adverb negatif/restriktif ('Only rarely') harus diinversi. Harusnya 'have I'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲e̲a̲s̲o̲n̲ w̲h̲y̲ he left i̲s̲ b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ he was ill.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. 'The reason... is that...', bukan 'because'. Harusnya 'that'.

written_expression.questionText: We r̲a̲n̲ o̲u̲t̲ ̲o̲f̲ b̲r̲e̲a̲d̲s̲ at the b̲a̲k̲e̲r̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Bread' tidak bisa dihitung (uncountable). Gunakan 'bread' atau 'loaves of bread'.

written_expression.questionText: D̲u̲e̲ ̲t̲o̲ the weather w̲a̲s̲ ̲b̲a̲d̲, t̲h̲e̲ ̲f̲l̲i̲g̲h̲t̲ w̲a̲s̲ ̲c̲a̲n̲c̲e̲l̲e̲d̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition vs Conjunction. 'Due to' diikuti noun phrase. Karena diikuti klausa 'the weather was bad', gunakan 'Because'.

written_expression.questionText: He s̲t̲o̲p̲p̲e̲d̲ t̲o̲ ̲s̲m̲o̲k̲e̲ b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ it was b̲a̲d̲ for his health.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund Meaning. 'Stop to smoke' = berhenti (kegiatan lain) untuk merokok. 'Stop smoking' = berhenti merokok. Harusnya 'smoking'.

written_expression.questionText: The s̲c̲i̲s̲s̲o̲r̲s̲ i̲s̲ s̲h̲a̲r̲p̲ enough t̲o̲ ̲c̲u̲t̲ the cloth.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. 'Scissors' selalu jamak. Harusnya 'are'.

written_expression.questionText: She i̲s̲ m̲a̲r̲r̲i̲e̲d̲ w̲i̲t̲h̲ a̲ ̲d̲o̲c̲t̲o̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition. Pasangan 'married' adalah 'to', bukan 'with'. Harusnya 'to'.

written_expression.questionText: There i̲s̲ m̲a̲n̲y̲ c̲a̲r̲s̲ on the r̲o̲a̲d̲ today.
written_expression.explanation: Existential 'There'. Subjeknya 'many cars' (jamak). Harusnya 'There are'.

written_expression.questionText: He is c̲a̲p̲a̲b̲i̲l̲i̲t̲y̲ o̲f̲ s̲o̲l̲v̲i̲n̲g̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲p̲r̲o̲b̲l̲e̲m̲.
written_expression.explanation: Word Form. Setelah to be 'is', butuh adjective, bukan noun. Harusnya 'capable'.

written_expression.questionText: N̲o̲t̲ ̲o̲n̲l̲y̲ t̲h̲e̲ ̲s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲ but also t̲h̲e̲ ̲t̲e̲a̲c̲h̲e̲r̲ a̲r̲e̲ present.
written_expression.explanation: Paired Conjunction Agreement. Verb mengikuti subjek kedua/terdekat ('the teacher' = tunggal). Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: The i̲n̲f̲o̲r̲m̲a̲t̲i̲o̲n̲s̲ p̲r̲o̲v̲i̲d̲e̲d̲ w̲e̲r̲e̲ i̲n̲c̲o̲r̲r̲e̲c̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Information' tidak bisa ditambah 's'. Harusnya 'information'.

written_expression.questionText: We l̲o̲o̲k̲ forward t̲o̲ m̲e̲e̲t̲ y̲o̲u̲.
written_expression.explanation: Phrase Structure. 'Look forward to' diikuti V-ing. Harusnya 'meeting'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲l̲m̲o̲s̲t̲ s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲ p̲a̲s̲s̲e̲d̲ t̲h̲e̲ exam.
written_expression.explanation: Quantifier Usage. 'Almost' adalah adverb. Butuh determiner seperti 'Almost all (of) the students' atau 'Most students'.

written_expression.questionText: It was s̲u̲c̲h̲ e̲x̲p̲e̲n̲s̲i̲v̲e̲ car t̲h̲a̲t̲ I couldn't b̲u̲y̲ it.
written_expression.explanation: Article Usage. 'Car' adalah singular countable noun, butuh artikel 'an'. Harusnya 'such an expensive car'.

written_expression.questionText: I h̲a̲v̲e̲ ̲b̲e̲e̲n̲ w̲a̲i̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ f̲o̲r̲ you s̲i̲n̲c̲e̲ two hours.
written_expression.explanation: Time Preposition. Untuk durasi, gunakan 'for', bukan 'since'. Harusnya 'for two hours'.

written_expression.questionText: The f̲i̲v̲e̲-̲s̲t̲a̲r̲s̲ h̲o̲t̲e̲l̲ i̲s̲ v̲e̲r̲y̲ luxurious.
written_expression.explanation: Compound Adjective. Noun dalam compound adjective harus tunggal. Harusnya 'five-star'.

written_expression.questionText: M̲a̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ m̲i̲s̲t̲a̲k̲e̲s̲ a̲r̲e̲ a̲ ̲p̲a̲r̲t̲ of learning.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund Subject. Subjek kalimat adalah 'Making' (tunggal). Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: He is i̲n̲t̲e̲r̲e̲s̲t̲i̲n̲g̲ i̲n̲ h̲i̲s̲t̲o̲r̲y̲ b̲o̲o̲k̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Participle Adjective. Dia 'tertarik', bukan 'menarik'. Harusnya 'interested'.

written_expression.questionText: The p̲o̲l̲i̲c̲e̲ i̲s̲ l̲o̲o̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ for the s̲u̲s̲p̲e̲c̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Collective Noun. 'Police' selalu jamak. Harusnya 'are'.

written_expression.questionText: You h̲a̲d̲ ̲b̲e̲t̲t̲e̲r̲ t̲o̲ ̲s̲t̲u̲d̲y̲ i̲f̲ you want t̲o̲ ̲p̲a̲s̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Modal Phrase. 'Had better' diikuti bare infinitive. Harusnya 'study'.

written_expression.questionText: W̲h̲o̲m̲ i̲s̲ k̲n̲o̲c̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ at t̲h̲e̲ door?
written_expression.explanation: Interrogative Pronoun. Dibutuhkan subjek untuk verb 'is knocking'. Harusnya 'Who'.

written_expression.questionText: I p̲r̲e̲f̲e̲r̲ w̲a̲l̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ t̲h̲a̲n̲ d̲r̲i̲v̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: Prefer usage. 'Prefer... to...', bukan 'than'. Harusnya 'to'.

written_expression.questionText: The a̲m̲o̲u̲n̲t̲ of s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲s̲ i̲s̲ i̲n̲c̲r̲e̲a̲s̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: Countable Noun. 'Students' bisa dihitung. Gunakan 'number', bukan 'amount'.

written_expression.questionText: If I w̲a̲s̲ r̲i̲c̲h̲, I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ travel t̲h̲e̲ ̲w̲o̲r̲l̲d̲.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Type 2. Untuk pengandaian, 'be' selalu 'were'. Harusnya 'were'.

written_expression.questionText: The h̲a̲r̲d̲e̲r̲ you s̲t̲u̲d̲y̲, the m̲o̲s̲t̲ y̲o̲u̲ ̲l̲e̲a̲r̲n̲.
written_expression.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The more..., the more...'. Pasangan 'the harder' harusnya 'the more', bukan 'the most'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ the weather w̲a̲s̲ cold, s̲o̲ we stayed i̲n̲d̲o̲o̲r̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. Jangan gunakan 'Because' dan 'so' dalam satu kalimat majemuk. Hapus 'so'.

written_expression.questionText: The a̲t̲h̲l̲e̲t̲e̲ w̲h̲i̲c̲h̲ won the r̲a̲c̲e̲ is m̲y̲ ̲b̲r̲o̲t̲h̲e̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Relative Pronoun. Untuk orang ('athlete'), gunakan 'who', bukan 'which'.

written_expression.questionText: She h̲a̲s̲ l̲i̲v̲e̲d̲ in London s̲i̲n̲c̲e̲ f̲i̲v̲e̲ ̲y̲e̲a̲r̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition of Time. Untuk durasi waktu ('five years'), gunakan 'for', bukan 'since'.

written_expression.questionText: The i̲n̲f̲o̲r̲m̲a̲t̲i̲o̲n̲ w̲e̲r̲e̲ c̲o̲n̲f̲u̲s̲i̲n̲g̲ to t̲h̲e̲ students.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Information' adalah tunggal. Harusnya 'was'.

written_expression.questionText: I s̲u̲g̲g̲e̲s̲t̲ that h̲e̲ g̲o̲e̲s̲ to th̲e̲ d̲o̲c̲t̲o̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'suggest that', verb harus bare infinitive (bentuk dasar). Harusnya 'go'.

written_expression.questionText: U̲n̲l̲i̲k̲e̲ his brother, w̲h̲o̲ is tall, J̲o̲h̲n̲ ̲i̲s̲ very s̲h̲o̲r̲t̲l̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Adjective usage. 'Shortly' adalah adverb (artinya 'segera'). Untuk tinggi badan, gunakan adjective 'short'.

written_expression.questionText: The n̲u̲m̲b̲e̲r̲ of p̲e̲o̲p̲l̲e̲ a̲r̲e̲ i̲n̲c̲r̲e̲a̲s̲i̲n̲g̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'The number' selalu diikuti verb tunggal. Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: He d̲i̲d̲n̲'̲t̲ p̲a̲s̲s̲ the exam, and s̲o̲ ̲d̲i̲d̲ h̲i̲s̲ friend.
written_expression.explanation: Negative Agreement. Karena kalimat pertama negatif ('didn't'), gunakan 'neither did', bukan 'so did'.

written_expression.questionText: The d̲o̲g̲ w̲a̲g̲g̲e̲d̲ i̲t̲'̲s̲ t̲a̲i̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Possessive Pronoun. 'It's' = 'It is'. Untuk kepemilikan, gunakan 'its' (tanpa apostrof).

written_expression.questionText: She i̲s̲ c̲a̲p̲a̲b̲l̲e̲ to d̲r̲i̲v̲e̲ a̲ ̲c̲a̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Idiom. Pasangan 'capable' adalah 'of + V-ing'. Harusnya 'capable of driving'.

written_expression.questionText: E̲v̲e̲r̲y̲ students m̲u̲s̲t̲ b̲r̲i̲n̲g̲ t̲h̲e̲i̲r̲ own lunch.
written_expression.explanation: Noun Number. Setelah 'Every', noun harus tunggal. Harusnya 'Every student'.

written_expression.questionText: I a̲m̲ ̲t̲h̲i̲n̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ t̲o̲ ̲g̲o̲ t̲o̲ ̲P̲a̲r̲i̲s̲ n̲e̲x̲t̲ ̲y̲e̲a̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition + Gerund. 'Think of/about' diikuti gerund. Harusnya 'of going'.

written_expression.questionText: The p̲o̲l̲i̲c̲e̲ o̲f̲f̲i̲c̲e̲r̲ g̲a̲v̲e̲ me a̲n̲ ̲a̲d̲v̲i̲c̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Advice' tidak bisa pakai artikel 'an'. Gunakan 'some advice' atau 'a piece of advice'.

written_expression.questionText: We d̲i̲s̲c̲u̲s̲s̲e̲d̲ r̲e̲g̲a̲r̲d̲i̲n̲g̲ the m̲a̲t̲t̲e̲r̲ y̲e̲s̲t̲e̲r̲d̲a̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. 'Discuss' langsung diikuti objek. Hapus 'regarding' atau ganti 'discussed' dengan 'talked about'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲a̲c̲h̲i̲n̲e̲r̲y̲ n̲e̲e̲d̲s̲ to b̲e̲ r̲e̲p̲a̲i̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Passive Voice. Setelah 'to be', gunakan past participle. Harusnya 'repaired'.

written_expression.questionText: W̲h̲o̲m̲ i̲s̲ p̲l̲a̲y̲i̲n̲g̲ the p̲i̲a̲n̲o̲?
written_expression.explanation: Pronoun Case. Subjek kalimat harus 'Who', bukan 'Whom'.

written_expression.questionText: There i̲s̲ a̲ ̲f̲e̲w̲ c̲o̲o̲k̲i̲e̲s̲ left i̲n̲ the jar.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'a few cookies' jamak. Harusnya 'There are'.

written_expression.questionText: She l̲o̲o̲k̲s̲ b̲e̲a̲u̲t̲i̲f̲u̲l̲l̲y̲ i̲n̲ that d̲r̲e̲s̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Linking Verb. 'Looks' diikuti adjective, bukan adverb. Harusnya 'beautiful'.

written_expression.questionText: The p̲r̲i̲c̲e̲ of g̲o̲l̲d̲ has r̲i̲s̲e̲n̲ f̲a̲s̲t̲l̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb Form. Tidak ada kata 'fastly'. Adverb dari 'fast' tetap 'fast'.

written_expression.questionText: I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ l̲i̲k̲e̲ b̲u̲y̲i̲n̲g̲ a n̲e̲w̲ car.
written_expression.explanation: Would Like. Struktur 'would like' diikuti to-infinitive. Harusnya 'to buy'.

written_expression.questionText: The n̲e̲w̲s̲ a̲b̲o̲u̲t̲ the a̲c̲c̲i̲d̲e̲n̲t̲ a̲r̲e̲ terrible.
written_expression.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'News' tunggal. Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: He i̲s̲ k̲n̲o̲w̲i̲n̲g̲ t̲h̲e̲ answer n̲o̲w̲.
written_expression.explanation: Stative Verb. Kata kerja 'know' tidak digunakan dalam bentuk continuous (V-ing). Harusnya 'knows'.

written_expression.questionText: D̲e̲s̲p̲i̲t̲e̲ i̲t̲ ̲w̲a̲s̲ raining, we w̲e̲n̲t̲ o̲u̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Conjunction vs Preposition. 'Despite' diikuti noun. Karena ada klausa 'it was raining', gunakan 'Although'.

written_expression.questionText: The s̲c̲i̲s̲s̲o̲r̲s̲ c̲u̲t̲s̲ t̲h̲e̲ paper e̲a̲s̲i̲l̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. 'Scissors' jamak. Harusnya 'cut'.

written_expression.questionText: I h̲a̲v̲e̲ n̲e̲v̲e̲r̲ s̲a̲w̲ s̲u̲c̲h̲ a thing.
written_expression.explanation: Present Perfect. Setelah auxiliary 'have', gunakan past participle (V3). Harusnya 'seen'.

written_expression.questionText: The t̲e̲a̲m̲ a̲r̲e̲ w̲i̲n̲n̲i̲n̲g̲ t̲h̲e̲ game.
written_expression.explanation: Collective Noun. 'Team' sebagai satu unit dianggap tunggal. Harusnya 'is'. (Kecuali menekankan individu, tapi di TOEFL umumnya tunggal).

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲t̲w̲e̲e̲n̲ you and I̲, t̲h̲i̲s̲ is a s̲e̲c̲r̲e̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Object Pronoun. Setelah preposisi 'between', gunakan object pronoun 'me', bukan 'I'. Harusnya 'Between you and me'.

written_expression.questionText: One o̲f̲ the s̲t̲u̲d̲e̲n̲t̲ i̲s̲ a̲b̲s̲e̲n̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: One of + Plural. Setelah 'One of the', noun harus jamak. Harusnya 'students'.

written_expression.questionText: She n̲e̲e̲d̲s̲ f̲i̲n̲i̲s̲h̲ h̲e̲r̲ h̲o̲m̲e̲w̲o̲r̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Infinitive. 'Need' diikuti to-infinitive. Harusnya 'to finish'.

written_expression.questionText: The c̲a̲r̲ c̲o̲s̲t̲ t̲e̲n̲ t̲h̲o̲u̲s̲a̲n̲d̲ ̲d̲o̲l̲l̲a̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. Setelah angka jamak (ten thousand), noun harus jamak. Harusnya 'dollars'.

written_expression.questionText: He l̲a̲i̲d̲ d̲o̲w̲n̲ o̲n̲ the bed t̲o̲ ̲r̲e̲s̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Lay vs Lie. Untuk arti 'berbaring' (intransitive), Past Tense-nya adalah 'lay'. Tapi Present-nya 'lie'. Kalimat ini Past Tense? Jika Past Tense, 'He lay down'. Jika Present, 'He lies down'. Kata 'laid' adalah past tense dari 'lay' (meletakkan). Di sini dia berbaring, jadi harusnya 'lay' (jika lampau) atau 'lies'. Dalam error recognition, 'laid' pasti salah untuk arti berbaring.

written_expression.questionText: The e̲f̲f̲e̲c̲t̲s̲ of t̲h̲e̲ drug w̲a̲s̲ u̲n̲k̲n̲o̲w̲n̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'effects' jamak. Harusnya 'were'.

written_expression.questionText: I p̲r̲e̲f̲e̲r̲ t̲e̲a̲ t̲h̲a̲n̲ c̲o̲f̲f̲e̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Prefer. Pasangannya 'to', bukan 'than'. Harusnya 'tea to coffee'.

written_expression.questionText: N̲o̲t̲ ̲o̲n̲l̲y̲ d̲i̲d̲ ̲h̲e̲ study, b̲u̲t̲ he also w̲o̲r̲k̲.
written_expression.explanation: Parallelism/Tense. Kalimat pertama pakai 'did' (Past), maka kalimat kedua juga harus Past. Harusnya 'worked'.

written_expression.questionText: The b̲u̲i̲l̲d̲i̲n̲g̲ w̲a̲s̲ d̲e̲s̲t̲r̲o̲y̲ b̲y̲ the fire.
written_expression.explanation: Passive Voice. To be + V3. Harusnya 'destroyed'.

written_expression.questionText: He is t̲a̲l̲l̲e̲r̲ f̲r̲o̲m̲ h̲i̲s̲ f̲a̲t̲h̲e̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Comparative. Pasangan 'taller' adalah 'than', bukan 'from'.

written_expression.questionText: She e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲s̲ t̲o̲ ̲r̲e̲a̲d̲ m̲y̲s̲t̲e̲r̲y̲ n̲o̲v̲e̲l̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund. 'Enjoy' diikuti V-ing. Harusnya 'reading'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲e̲a̲s̲o̲n̲ t̲h̲a̲t̲ he failed i̲s̲ b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ he didn't study.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. 'The reason... is that...'. Jangan gunakan 'because' lagi. Harusnya 'that'.

written_expression.questionText: I h̲a̲v̲e̲ l̲i̲v̲e̲d̲ here s̲i̲n̲c̲e̲ t̲h̲r̲e̲e̲ ̲y̲e̲a̲r̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition. Untuk durasi, gunakan 'for'. Harusnya 'for three years'.

written_expression.questionText: The c̲h̲i̲l̲d̲r̲e̲n̲ w̲a̲s̲ e̲x̲c̲i̲t̲e̲d̲ a̲b̲o̲u̲t̲ the trip.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Subject. 'Children' jamak. Harusnya 'were'.

written_expression.questionText: M̲a̲k̲i̲n̲g̲ f̲r̲i̲e̲n̲d̲s̲ a̲r̲e̲ i̲m̲p̲o̲r̲t̲a̲n̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund Subject. 'Making' adalah subjek tunggal. Harusnya 'is'.

written_expression.questionText: He w̲o̲r̲k̲s̲ a̲̲s̲ a̲ engi̲n̲eer i̲n̲ the city.
written_expression.explanation: Article. 'Engineer' diawali bunyi vokal, gunakan 'an'.

written_expression.questionText: They r̲e̲t̲u̲r̲n̲e̲d̲ b̲a̲c̲k̲ t̲o̲ the h̲o̲t̲e̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. 'Return' sudah berarti kembali. Hapus 'back'.

written_expression.questionText: The b̲a̲b̲y̲ c̲r̲y̲i̲n̲g̲ l̲o̲u̲d̲l̲y̲ l̲a̲s̲t̲ ̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Missing Verb. Kalimat ini butuh finite verb. Harusnya 'cried' atau 'was crying'.

written_expression.questionText: She c̲a̲n̲ s̲p̲e̲a̲k̲s̲ t̲h̲r̲e̲e̲ l̲a̲n̲g̲u̲a̲g̲e̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Modal Verb. Setelah modal 'can', verb harus bare infinitive (tanpa 's'). Harusnya 'speak'.

written_expression.questionText: The h̲o̲m̲e̲w̲o̲r̲k̲ w̲a̲s̲ s̲o̲ difficult f̲o̲r̲ ̲I̲.
written_expression.explanation: Object Pronoun. Setelah preposisi 'for', gunakan object pronoun 'me'. Harusnya 'for me'.

written_expression.questionText: We e̲n̲j̲o̲y̲e̲d̲ o̲u̲r̲s̲ t̲i̲m̲e̲ a̲t̲ the beach.
written_expression.explanation: Possessive Adjective. Sebelum noun 'time', gunakan 'our'. 'Ours' adalah possessive pronoun yang berdiri sendiri.

written_expression.questionText: If I h̲a̲v̲e̲ t̲i̲m̲e̲, I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ help y̲o̲u̲.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Mixed. Jika result clause pakai 'would' (Type 2), if clause harus Past Tense. Harusnya 'had'. Atau ubah belakangnya jadi 'will help'.

written_expression.questionText: The t̲e̲a̲c̲h̲e̲r̲ e̲x̲p̲l̲a̲i̲n̲e̲d̲ the l̲e̲s̲s̲o̲n̲ c̲l̲e̲a̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb. Untuk menjelaskan verb 'explained', gunakan adverb. Harusnya 'clearly'.

written_expression.questionText: The d̲e̲v̲e̲l̲o̲p̲m̲e̲n̲t̲ of the new smartphone w̲a̲s̲ ̲d̲e̲l̲a̲y̲e̲d̲ b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ technical d̲i̲f̲f̲i̲c̲u̲l̲t̲.
written_expression.explanation: Noun Phrase. 'Difficult' adalah adjective. Setelah 'technical' (adjective), kita butuh noun 'difficulties' atau 'difficulty'.

written_expression.questionText: A̲l̲t̲h̲o̲u̲g̲h̲ the car was e̲x̲p̲e̲n̲s̲i̲v̲e̲, b̲u̲t̲ it had m̲a̲n̲y̲ problems.
written_expression.explanation: Redundancy. 'Although' dan 'but' tidak boleh digunakan bersamaan dalam satu kalimat. Hapus 'but'.

written_expression.questionText: The manager s̲u̲g̲g̲e̲s̲t̲e̲d̲ that we s̲h̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ ̲t̲o̲ ̲f̲i̲n̲i̲s̲h̲ t̲h̲e̲ project b̲y̲ Friday.
written_expression.explanation: Modal/Subjunctive. Setelah 'suggested that', gunakan subjunctive (bare infinitive) 'finish' atau 'should finish' tanpa 'to'. Harusnya 'finish' atau 'should finish'.

written_expression.questionText: If I w̲a̲s̲ you, I w̲o̲u̲l̲d̲ ̲a̲c̲c̲e̲p̲t̲ t̲h̲e̲ offer i̲m̲m̲e̲d̲i̲a̲t̲e̲l̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Conditional Type 2. Untuk pengandaian yang tidak nyata, 'to be' untuk semua subjek adalah 'were'. Harusnya 'If I were you'.

written_expression.questionText: They a̲r̲e̲ ̲p̲l̲a̲n̲n̲i̲n̲g̲ b̲u̲i̲l̲d̲i̲n̲g̲ a n̲e̲w̲ bridge a̲c̲r̲o̲s̲s̲ the river.
written_expression.explanation: Infinitive. Kata kerja 'plan' diikuti oleh to-infinitive, bukan gerund. Harusnya 'to build'.

written_expression.questionText: The s̲y̲m̲p̲t̲o̲m̲s̲ of the disease i̲n̲c̲l̲u̲d̲e̲s̲ fever, h̲e̲a̲d̲a̲c̲h̲e̲, and f̲a̲t̲i̲g̲u̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'symptoms' jamak, jadi verb harus jamak 'include'.

written_expression.questionText: He is c̲o̲n̲s̲i̲d̲e̲r̲e̲d̲ a̲s̲ the b̲e̲s̲t̲ player i̲n̲ the team.
written_expression.explanation: Idiom. 'Consider' tidak diikuti 'as' ketika berarti 'dianggap sebagai'. Harusnya 'He is considered the best player'.

written_expression.questionText: I h̲a̲v̲e̲n̲'̲t̲ ̲s̲e̲e̲n̲ h̲i̲m̲ s̲i̲n̲c̲e̲ t̲h̲r̲e̲e̲ ̲y̲e̲a̲r̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition of Time. Untuk durasi waktu (three years), gunakan 'for'. 'Since' untuk titik waktu awal.

written_expression.questionText: The n̲u̲m̲b̲e̲r̲ of students w̲h̲o̲ w̲a̲n̲t̲s̲ to join i̲s̲ increasing.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Who' merujuk pada 'students' (jamak), jadi verb harus 'want'. 'The number' (subjek utama) tunggal, jadi 'is' benar.

written_expression.questionText: U̲n̲l̲e̲s̲s̲ you d̲o̲n̲'̲t̲ ̲s̲t̲u̲d̲y̲, you w̲i̲l̲l̲ ̲n̲o̲t̲ p̲a̲s̲s̲ the exam.
written_expression.explanation: Double Negative. 'Unless' berarti 'if...not'. Jadi tidak perlu 'don't'. Harusnya 'Unless you study'.

written_expression.questionText: The coffee i̲s̲ t̲o̲o̲ hot f̲o̲r̲ ̲d̲r̲i̲n̲k̲ r̲i̲g̲h̲t̲ ̲n̲o̲w̲.
written_expression.explanation: Infinitive. Pola 'too...to'. Harusnya 'too hot to drink'.

written_expression.questionText: B̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ ̲o̲f̲ the weather w̲a̲s̲ bad, we d̲e̲c̲i̲d̲e̲d̲ ̲t̲o̲ s̲t̲a̲y̲ home.
written_expression.explanation: Conjunction. 'Because of' diikuti noun phrase. Karena diikuti klausa 'the weather was bad', gunakan conjunction 'Because'.

written_expression.questionText: She c̲a̲n̲n̲o̲t̲ h̲a̲r̲d̲l̲y̲ wait t̲o̲ ̲s̲e̲e̲ h̲e̲r̲ parents.
written_expression.explanation: Double Negative. 'Hardly' sudah bermakna negatif (hampir tidak). Jangan gunakan 'cannot'. Hapus 'not' -> 'She can hardly wait'.

written_expression.questionText: The r̲e̲s̲u̲l̲t̲s̲ of the e̲x̲p̲e̲r̲i̲m̲e̲n̲t̲ are m̲o̲r̲e̲ ̲b̲e̲t̲t̲e̲r̲ t̲h̲a̲n̲ expected.
written_expression.explanation: Double Comparative. 'Better' sudah bentuk komparatif. Tidak perlu 'more'. Cukup 'better' atau 'much better'.

written_expression.questionText: Each o̲f̲ the p̲a̲r̲t̲i̲c̲i̲p̲a̲n̲t̲s̲ h̲a̲v̲e̲ received a̲ ̲c̲e̲r̲t̲i̲f̲i̲c̲a̲t̲e̲ o̲f̲ attendance.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Each' adalah tunggal. Use 'has received'.

written_expression.questionText: We d̲i̲s̲c̲u̲s̲s̲e̲d̲ a̲b̲o̲u̲t̲ the issue a̲t̲ the meeting y̲e̲s̲t̲e̲r̲d̲a̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Transitive Verb. 'Discuss' tidak diikuti preposisi 'about'. Harusnya 'discussed the issue'.

written_expression.questionText: Do you k̲n̲o̲w̲ w̲h̲e̲r̲e̲ i̲s̲ ̲t̲h̲e̲ ̲s̲t̲a̲t̲i̲o̲n̲ l̲o̲c̲a̲t̲e̲d̲?
written_expression.explanation: Embedded Question. Dalam kalimat tanya bertingkat, urutan subjek-verb tidak dibalik. Harusnya 'where the station is'.

written_expression.questionText: My sister w̲o̲r̲k̲s̲ h̲a̲r̲d̲l̲y̲ to s̲u̲p̲p̲o̲r̲t̲ h̲e̲r̲ family.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb confusion. 'Hardly' berarti 'hampir tidak'. 'Dengan keras' adalah 'hard'. Harusnya 'works hard'.

written_expression.questionText: I p̲r̲e̲f̲e̲r̲ c̲o̲f̲f̲e̲e̲ t̲h̲a̲n̲ t̲e̲a̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition. Pasangan 'prefer' adalah 'to', bukan 'than'. Harusnya 'prefer coffee to tea'.

written_expression.questionText: The p̲o̲l̲i̲c̲e̲ i̲s̲ investigating t̲h̲e̲ ̲c̲r̲i̲m̲e̲ s̲c̲e̲n̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Plural Noun. 'Police' adalah kata benda jamak. Harusnya 'are investigating'.

written_expression.questionText: She l̲o̲o̲k̲s̲ b̲e̲a̲u̲t̲i̲f̲u̲l̲l̲y̲ i̲n̲ that d̲r̲e̲s̲s̲.
written_expression.explanation: Linking Verb. 'Looks' diikuti adjective, bukan adverb. Harusnya 'looks beautiful'.

written_expression.questionText: I s̲t̲o̲p̲p̲e̲d̲ t̲o̲ ̲s̲m̲o̲k̲e̲ b̲e̲c̲a̲u̲s̲e̲ it is u̲n̲h̲e̲a̲l̲t̲h̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund vs Infinitive. 'Stop to smoke' berarti berhenti melakukan sesuatu UNTUK merokok. Berhenti merokok selamanya adalah 'stopped smoking'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲a̲n̲ w̲h̲i̲c̲h̲ lives n̲e̲x̲t̲ door is a̲ ̲d̲o̲c̲t̲o̲r̲.
written_expression.explanation: Relative Pronoun. Untuk orang (man), gunakan 'who', bukan 'which'.

written_expression.questionText: Did you w̲e̲n̲t̲ t̲o̲ ̲t̲h̲e̲ c̲i̲n̲e̲m̲a̲ l̲a̲s̲t̲ ̲n̲i̲g̲h̲t̲?
written_expression.explanation: Auxiliary Verb. Setelah 'Did', kata kerja kembali ke bentuk dasar (V1). Harusnya 'go'.

written_expression.questionText: T̲h̲e̲r̲e̲ ̲i̲s̲ m̲a̲n̲y̲ books o̲n̲ the t̲a̲b̲l̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'many books' jamak, jadi harusnya 'There are'.

written_expression.questionText: I a̲m̲ ̲n̲o̲t̲ u̲s̲e̲d̲ ̲t̲o̲ d̲r̲i̲v̲e̲ on the l̲e̲f̲t̲ side.
written_expression.explanation: Gerund. 'Be used to' (terbiasa) diikuti V-ing. Harusnya 'driving'. 'Used to' (dulu) diikuti V1.

written_expression.questionText: We a̲r̲r̲i̲v̲e̲d̲ a̲t̲ the airport i̲n̲ 6̲:̲0̲0̲ ̲P̲M̲.
written_expression.explanation: Preposition of Time. Untuk jam spesifik, gunakan 'at'. Harusnya 'at 6:00 PM'.

written_expression.questionText: The m̲o̲s̲t̲ u̲n̲i̲q̲u̲e̲ painting w̲a̲s̲ ̲s̲o̲l̲d̲ y̲e̲s̲t̲e̲r̲d̲a̲y̲.
written_expression.explanation: Adjective. 'Unique' bersifat mutlak (satu-satunya), tidak bisa dibandingkan dengan 'most' atau 'more'. Hapus 'most'.

written_expression.questionText: N̲e̲i̲t̲h̲e̲r̲ John o̲r̲ Mary w̲a̲n̲t̲s̲ ̲t̲o̲ c̲o̲m̲e̲.
written_expression.explanation: Paired Conjunction. Pasangan 'Neither' adalah 'nor'. Harusnya 'nor'.

written_expression.questionText: He s̲p̲e̲a̲k̲s̲ E̲n̲g̲l̲i̲s̲h̲ g̲o̲o̲d̲ enough t̲o̲ ̲t̲r̲a̲v̲e̲l̲.
written_expression.explanation: Adverb. 'Speaks' adalah verb, dijelaskan oleh adverb. Harusnya 'well enough'.
